channel.title: Is there any way to change the amount of a drop?
channel.description: say i want something to drop 10k coins how would i make that? i know how to add a drop just dont know how to add an amount

item.title: Is there any way to change the amount of a drop?
item.dc:creator: @trevor268 trevor268
item.description:
@trevor268 wrote:

umm mine looks like this so where would i add the amount? [code]public static int InfernalMage[] = {526,526,526,526,526,526,526,526,526,526,526,526,526,526,526,526,526,526,526,526,526,526,526,526,526,526,};

public static int randomInfernalMage()
{
	return InfernalMage[(int)(Math.random()*InfernalMage.length)];
}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Is there any way to change the amount of a drop?

item.title: Is there any way to change the amount of a drop?
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

npcdrop = npcid itemid itemamount %chance //(addy Full) 1%[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 01, 2008, 09:24:59 PM[/size][hr]npcdrop = npcid itemid itemamount %chance //itemname
